arts.ttl: Arsenal hit with fresh injury headache as Leandro Trossard limps off during Belgium's Nations League defeat
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta's Arsenal side have suffered a fresh injury concern as Leandro Trossard was forced off during the first-half of Belgium's loss against Israel in the Nations League.

arts.ttl: Leandro Trossard hands Mikel Arteta another international nightmare as Arsenal star injured

arts.ttl: Belgium coach Tedesco: “Knee problem for Lukaku” – Doubtful for Napoli-Roma clash
arts.sum: Belgium national team coach Domenico Tedesco has revealed that striker Romelu Lukaku is facing a knee issue, putting his participation in Napoli’s upcoming Serie A match against Roma in doubt. Sky Sport Italia report how Lukaku, who played the full 90 minutes as captain in Belgium’s recent Nations League defeat to Italy, has left the national team camp and returned to Napoli’s training facility in Castel Volturno. What initially appeared to be a mutual agreement for Lukaku to skip Belgium’s final Nations League match against Israel has now been confirmed as an injury-related decision. In his pre-match press conference ahead The post Belgium coach Tedesco: “Knee problem for Lukaku” – Doubtful for Napoli-Roma clash appeared first on FootItalia.com.
